hero.blurb: Fullstack developer specialized in internal systems and business process automation. Experience with React, Next.js, Nest.js, Supabase, LangChain and n8n to build innovative solutions that optimize operations.

about.p1: Fullstack developer with experience in internal systems, business process automation and financial management. Specialized in React, Next.js, Nest.js, Supabase and AI technologies.
about.p2: Background in Accounting and Finance with professional experience in auditing, internal control and project management. Currently Project Administrator at MPM AMCOR and part of the team for the "CUBA CIRCULAR" project funded by the German Federal Ministry for the Environment.
about.p3: Over 8 projects developed for business management in shipping, exports and retail, combining technical knowledge with business vision.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Explore my portfolio of web applications, AI solutions, and development tools

items.title: TRG - Shipping Management System
items.description: Complete system for managing container shipments from the USA to Cuba with process automation from dispatch to final distribution.

items.title: Routule Print (Elstar)
items.description: Platform for creating marketplaces and vertical integration of the entire value chain. Enables retail stores to create their system without programmers.

items.title: Mily Travel - E-commerce Platform
items.description: E-commerce platform with inventory management, payments, and order tracking. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance.

items.title: SOS Combo - E-commerce
items.description: E-commerce store for shipping agency to Cuba from the USA with product catalog and admin panel.

items.title: Maranatha - Management System
items.description: Comprehensive sales, messaging, and inventory management system for gift shops and convenience stores with payment integration.

items.title: Perxins - Havana Events
items.description: Web application to view events in Havana: cinemas, theaters, parties, concerts, and entertainment activities. PWA deployed on AWS.
items.techStack: React, Nest.js, MongoDB, PWA, AWS EC2

items.title: AI Bot with RAG
items.description: Intelligent bot connected to database using LangChain and LangGraph for augmented information retrieval with workflow automation.

items.title: Poinger - Web Improvements
items.description: Improvements to business website for product catalog with error resolution and site optimization.

items.title: React Native Project
items.description: Mobile application in development to complement the web ecosystem. Learning and expansion project towards mobile platforms.
